intro-description: Select your path: Are you purpose-driven talent seeking to make an impact, or an organization driving change?
intro-user-review: Socious not only helped me secure my dream environmental job, but also boosted my salary and enabled me to make a positive impact.
intro-org-review: Socious streamlined my startup's hiring process, saving time and money while finding skilled, passionate candidates.
intro-user-option-desc: Discover roles that matter and join forces with change makers
intro-org-option-desc: List opportunities and connect with talent who share your mission
